originalText.text: This car service is the best out there. Ricardo is so helpful. Trust me. The professionalism, communication, authentic hospitality, they are just amazing. I used them for my wedding and my daughters birthday and I can’t complain. They have exceeded my expectations. You just can’t go wrong with them.

originalText.text:
I would like to chair my experience with the Black tie services
Arriving before the scheduled time making sure that they will not be late
the personnel was extremely helpful professional and gracious the ride from the airport to home was very pleasant the car was clean newer models and comfortable. I highly recommend all my to use the black tie service

originalText.text: Can't say enough good things about this company. I have searched high and low for a car service in NYC that is reliable, cost effective and uses technology that makes my job easier as an EA. I book cars usually 4-5 times a week for my boss and Black Tie has never let me down. Awesome customer service and I love that my boss and myself can get automatic reminders and updates on the status of the driver etc. Would recommend over and over again!

originalText.text: Excellent all around!!!  We have had Alex and Amir and both have been superb!  So quick and professional and helpful!  We would highly recommend!

originalText.text: I reserved a pick up and drop off for my Mother’s retirement party and the professionalism and courtesy was excellent. From the booking, to answering questions, and communication on the day of were all superb. I would definitely recommend this company!!!!
